comment._content: looks to be Pope Pius X, he died in August 1914: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pope_Pius_X

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In Spring 1913, the Pope's ill health was in the news. See for example, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F02E7DB173FE633A... NYT of April 13, 1913. Date on the negative is 5/26/13
